Entry.JapaneseText: クレア、何を読んでいるんだ？
図書館で借りてきた詩集よ。 ステキな詩がたくさんあるの。
Entry.EnglishText: It's a poetry book I borrowed from the library. It contains many wonderful poems.

Entry.JapaneseText: 空のように、海のように、 深く深く澄む君の瞳の中に沈んでいく、僕は……
Entry.EnglishText: As though they were the seas, as though they were the skies, I find myself sinking deeper into your eyes...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレは、あまりこういうのは、 わからないが……悪くないかもな……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really get these sorts of things but... It's not bad...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうでしょ？ 他にもあるわよ、えっとね……
Entry.EnglishText: You think so? I have more. Let's see...
